page.title: 17ECOLOGY
page.content:
{FLOWERS
Arnside is famous for its abundance of wildflowers which flourish on the limestone rocks of Arnside Knott. A particular species which flowers in abundance is the early prurple orchid and other rare orchids and helleborines.
{TREES
Arnside Knott has a nature trail devised by the National Trust which gives an opportunity for walkers to identify the many varieties of tree which grow there. The trail also points out examples of glacial boulders, carbonferous rock formation, anthills and colonised stumps, etc.
